name: Skylar Brandt
label: Skylar Brandt began training full-time at ABT JKO at age 12, while the other three current principals who studied at the school only joined at 16 or 17 years old

name: James Whiteside
label: James Whiteside started his career at Boston Ballet and was a principal there before joining ABT as a soloist
All but two of ABT's current principal dancers passed through the studio company, joining on average at 18 years old
